name: DLL (Ast3)
description:
You woke up in an abandoned building in total darkness, you can't see anything more that 1 feet away of you. The only sound that you can hear its the cold and heavy wind that runs everywere in the room. Behind you, you found a flashlight an a note:

Hi, if you are reading this its because its too late for you...  

I can't get to wherever you are right now, I'm sorry...

Now i'ts your choice if you want to escape or give up...   

Alright, so if you want to really get out of there just follow the next advices:

See that flashlight over there?, GREAT

-Don't let the battery ran out of power, its very dark there and you don't want to get blind in this situation.

-Search a swich on the walls, theres a light in the dark that can help you, but it change of position every time. FIND IT AN ENTER IT

-BE SURE that the light its on before enter it, sometimes it doesn't work. The electricity its very messed there.

-Survive until dawn, only then you can escape. Also...

YOU ARE NOT ALONE THERE... RUN!!!  :)

  

figure it out...
